𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𓇗 𓇖

𓇔 Roggen 𓇖
𓇔 rush 𒊑 RI ≈ 𒄀 GI grass 𓇔 •Reis Res in 𓈣 (Sapi-Res)

𓇔 𓂋𓇓 R·SU #rsw ⲣⲏⲥ 𓁶 𓏤 𓇔 | the South | raš 𓁶 𓇔 rush 𓇔 𓇓𓂋 SU·R suður > buşûr başûr sûr *silatan "Süden" *salatan @Malay "south"

𒆳𒁕𒊒 šad-da-ru sedge® 𓇔
𒆳𒁕𒊒 a grass

𓇔 Roggen ⇔ regent rex raj

𒉿𒈛𒄷 ya-raḫ-ḫu rye Roggen @ Jericho
𒉿𒈛𒄷 a kind of good quality grain

𒊑𒂍𒌝 re-ᵍe-um™ regum regent 𒉺𒇻 SIPA “shepherd” rē'ûm רֹעֶה roʿɛ̂ “herdsman” رَاعِي rāʿī => roy roi king
𒊑𒄿𒌝 (re-i-um) rēʾûm 𒊑𒅀𒌝 (re-ya-um)

Estonian: rukis (et)
Faroese: rugur m
Finnish: ruis (fi)

नीवारिका nīvārikā
арыш arïš !

𓇓 سُلْت sult => sultan

𓇔 Süd/syr ⇔ 𓇓 shartan𓏏 Sultan Sahar
M24 𓇔 Sδ : Süd/syr 𓇔 'shemaa Sumer' swheat Suδan SUSAN Sici.LILY [OEg seshen] sedge 𓇓 Segge ⇔ 𓇕𓋑

𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𒐼 𒀸𒐼 𒃻 𒋩 𒉻 šar Ašur Ashur 𒀸𒃻 aš.šá® 𒃻 GAR 𓆰 grass 𒊸 SHAR 𒊺 SHE 𒉻 ŠUK

𒃶 qan “cane” in 𒃶𒊭𒆷𒇻 qan ša-la-lu a reed 𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𓇗 𓇖
